categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Oratio Nenvez was a male instructor aboard the Galactic Empire Star Destroyer Edict. He held the military rank of captain. After the Edict was stranded in the Pormthulis system, Nenvez and others aboard the Star Destroyer were liberated by the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, also known as Shadow Wing, and Nenvez and the others joined their ranks. He would continue to serve with the 204th during the Cerberon campaign, participated in Shadow Wing’s continuation of Operation: Cinder, and served in the Battle of Jakku.
By 5 ABY,[source?] Nenvez was an elderly man and used a cane to move around.
Nenvez was viewed by Soran Keize to be a man who was resistant to change and did everything possible to imprint his cadets with the spirit of the dead Empire.
